title: Is alcohol more harmful to the brain at three stages of life?
subtitle: During these three major periods, the brain undergoes dynamic changes, which may make the cognitive organ more sensitive to the neurotoxic effects of alcohol.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: According to a scientific review published in December 2020, researchers found that alcohol may be more harmful to the human brain at three ages: fetal development, average to late adolescence, and finally, population 65 and above.
